definition: to defecate (euphemism)/to go to the toilet

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
variant of 出[chu1] (classifier for plays or chapters of classical novels)

sentences.english: NG: 'He pinched my arse-proper pinched it when I was out.
sentences.chinese: 他捏我的屁股，大概是在我出恭的时候。

sentences.english: I saw your mom pee two times and she twisted my back.
sentences.chinese: 我偷看妈妈出恭两次，结果被她拧了一把。

definition: to relieve oneself (i.e. use the toilet)/to solve
to pee pee (kiddie or feminine slang)
to need to answer the call of nature
to pass water/to piss/to urinate/to wee wee
to change clothes/to go to the toilet (euphemism)
to have an audience (with the emperor)
variant of 茅廁|茅厕[mao2 si5]
